## Matrix4.multiply() method

Computes the product of two matrices.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static multiply(left: Matrix4, right: Matrix4, result?: Matrix4): Matrix4;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  left | [Matrix4](./toygl.matrix4.md) | The first matrix. |
|  right | [Matrix4](./toygl.matrix4.md) | The second matrix. |
|  result | [Matrix4](./toygl.matrix4.md) | _(Optional)_ The object onto which to store the result. |

**Returns:**

[Matrix4](./toygl.matrix4.md)

The modified result parameter.
